titleStmt.title: His Majesties declaration, in answer to a declaration of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, for the raising of all power and force, as well trained bands as others, in severall counties of this kingdom, to lead against all traitors and their adherents, &c.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
